name: Control Freak (itch) (Puato, atreyoauron)
description:
Made for GMTK JAM 2020. The project was made in under 48 hours, so expect some bugs and lack of polish.

You are a mutant Ghost that is trying to escape from a laboratory, armed only with the power of posession, you are going to control the bodies of everyone you meet to find the escape!

You can only possess enemies for 10 seconds, there is no visuals for this because there was no time left to put it.
Arrow Keys - Walk;
Space Bar - Jump;
Z - Possess;
X - Unpossess;
C - Use special hability;
R - Restar level.
